metadata.notes: Tier 1 starter equipment pulled from the Daggerheart SRD (May 2025). Damage dice do NOT yet include the proficiency bonus; add character.level‑based proficiency in UI. Armor damage thresholds are base—add level in Step 5 logic.

weapons.name: Longsword
weapons.description: Sturdy single‑handed blade popular among guardians and warriors.

weapons.name: Battleaxe
weapons.description: Bearded axe capable of heavy chops; can mark 1 Stress to hit an adjacent target.

weapons.name: Greatspear
weapons.description: Tall hafted spear granting Reach—treat Melee range as Very Close.

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.description: Curved bow of yew; requires two hands; disadvantage in Very Close.

weapons.name: Light Crossbow
weapons.description: Lever‑drawn arbalest; loading tag means you cannot attack twice per round with it.

weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: Slim blade easily concealed. Can be thrown to Very Close range.

weapons.name: Club
weapons.description: Stout cudgel of wood or bone.

weapons.name: Round Shield
weapons.description: Grants +1 Armor Score while wielded; may bash for minimal damage.

armor.name: Light Cloth
armor.description: Layered gambeson or padded clothing. Grants baseline protection without penalty.

armor.name: Chain Shirt
armor.description: Interlocking metal rings over padded cloth; limits stealth attempts.

armor.name: Half Plate
armor.description: Segmented steel breastplate, pauldrons, and greaves; noisy but stout.

gear.name: Torch
gear.description: Burns for 1 hour, illuminating Close range; can be used as improvised d4 fire weapon.

gear.name: Rope (50 ft)
gear.description: Hemp rope; DC 10 to break with Finesse roll.

gear.name: Basic Supplies
gear.description: Bedroll, flint & steel, mess kit, water skin, 1‑week rations.

potions.name: Minor Health Potion
potions.effect: Remove 1 marked Hit Point slot when consumed (action).
